tasks.label: Stop npm dev server
tasks.detail: Terminates all running Node.js processes for Vite dev server
tasks.command: Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.Name -eq 'node.exe' -and ($_.CommandLine -like '*vite*' -or $_.CommandLine -like '*npm*dev*') } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

tasks.label: Ensure dev server is running
tasks.detail: Checks if Vite dev server is running, starts it if not
tasks.command: $response = try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://127.0.0.1:5173' -Method Head -TimeoutSec 3 -UseBasicParsing -ErrorAction Stop; $true } catch { $false }; if (-not $response) { Write-Host 'Dev server not running, please start it manually or wait...'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; exit 1 } else { Write-Host 'Dev server is already running' }

tasks.label: Start dev server for debugging
tasks.detail: Ensures dependencies are installed and starts the Vite dev server
